wikipedia_page.main: Amelia Matilda Murray (30 April 1795 – 7 June 1884) was a British botanist, writer, and courtier. She wrote a book in defence of slavery in 1856.

response: * Amelia Matilda Murray (30 April 1795 – 7 June 1884)K. D. Reynolds, 'Murray, Amelia Matilda (1795–1884)', Oxford Dictionary of National Biography, Oxford University Press, 2004 accessed 3 Feb 2015http://users.uniserve.com/~canyon/qvcoronation.htm
* Amelia Matilda Murray (1795–1885), British botanist and writer
